bcid
Class resolver

java.lang.Object
  bcid.database
      bcid.resolver

public class resolver
extends database

Resolves any incoming identifier to the BCID and/or EZID systems. Resolver first checks if this is a dataset. If so, it then checks if there is a bcid. If it is not a BCID it then checks if there is a suffix to handle it is a resolvable suffix.
